name: Gargoyles: Night Flight
overview: Gargoyles, frozen in stone by day, flesh and blood winged warriors by night, have been transported to modern day New York City by the rich and powerful businessman David Xanatos! Join the Gargoyles' adventure as they come alive at night to defend the city. You play as Goliath, the leader of the Gargoyles, who must retrieve the pages of an ancient spell book before his arch rival Demona turns Manhattan to stone! Call your fellow Gargoyles for help in 5 stages of action and adventure!
